history.proof: intros. unfold is_gcd in *. split. - qsimpl use: divides_plus. - split. + apply divides_plus_inv with p; auto. * sfirstorder depth: 3. * hfcrush depth: 3. + intros k Hk1 Hk2. apply pow_N; auto. * hauto use: Nat.add_comm, divides_plus_inv. * hauto use: Nat.add_comm, divides_plus_inv. * sfirstorder depth: 3.

original: intros r q p H. unfold is_gcd in *. intros [H1 [H2 H3]]. split. - apply divides_plus; auto. - split. + apply divides_plus_inv with p; auto. + intros k Hk1 Hk2. apply H3; auto.
